sentences.en: He crossed to the bedside table and put out the light.
sentences.cn: 他走到床头柜的另一边关了灯。

sentences.en: He drew a chair up to the bedside and sat down.
sentences.cn: 他拉了把椅子到床边坐了下来。

sentences.en: He raised himself on one elbow and looked at the bedside clock.
sentences.cn: 他用一只胳膊肘撑起来看了看床边的钟.

sentences.en: He's a good doctor with a sympathetic bedside manner.
sentences.cn: 他是个好医生,对病人的态度很和善.

sentences.en: His mother has been at his bedside throughout his illness.
sentences.cn: 在他生病期间，他母亲一直守候在他床边。

sentences.en: His parents kept a round-the-clock vigil at his bedside.
sentences.cn: 他父母日夜守护在他的床边。

sentences.en: She had turned the bedside chair to face the door.
sentences.cn: 她把床头椅转向正对门的方向。

sentences.en: She kept a vigil at Patrick's bedside.
sentences.cn: 她在帕特里克的床边守夜。

sentences.en: She kept vigil at the bedside of her critically ill son.
sentences.cn: 她整夜都守在病重的儿子床边。

sentences.en: She put a cup of tea down on the bedside table.
sentences.cn: 她在床头柜上放了一杯茶。

sentences.en: She tiptoed to the bedside of the sleeping child.
sentences.cn: 她用脚尖悄悄地走到酣睡的孩子床前.

sentences.en: She was unable to be at his bedside when he died.
sentences.cn: 他死时,她未能守在他的床边.

sentences.en: The journal she had begun lay neglected on her bedside table.
sentences.cn: 她很早以前就开始看的那本杂志搁在床头柜上，好久没翻了。

sentences.en: The paintwork, the wardrobes and the bedside cupboards were coffee-cream.
sentences.cn: 漆面、衣柜和床头柜是浅咖啡色的。

sentences.en: There were stacks of books on the bedside table and floor.
sentences.cn: 床头桌和地板上有几摞书。

phrases.tran_cn: 床边态度（指医生对病人的态度）

trans.tran_en: the area beside your bed – used especially when talking about someone who is ill in bed
